title: Panasonic 335 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Silver, NR-TBG34VSS3)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, Ice Cube Tray, Egg Tray, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Product and Compressor are Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: All Aesthetic or Plastic Parts (e.g Doors, Plastic Shelfs, Glass Shelfs or Any Other Aesthetic Parts etc.) and Customer Abuse are Not Covered under Warranty

product_description.Inverter: The inverter of this refrigerator adjusts the motor’s rotation frequency to offer effective cooling while saving energy.
product_description.AG Clean Technology: This technology eliminates various harmful organisms, bacteria, and mold to ensure that your edibles are hygienic and fresh. This refrigerator also has a Silver Air Filter that kills up to 99.9% of the bacteria and mold inside this Panasonic home appliance. Also, the AG filter purifies the circulating air to reduce odours and to deactivate bacteria and mold.

review: I was very judgemental about buying this after hearing about product damage during delivery so I have to write this review to ease others in buying. The product was delivered in excellent condition and the packaging makes sure protection against damage. Fridge is worth the money as it is one time investment and keeps food fresh as described. Excellent space capacity to stack up evrything you need. Very less noise you can almost not hear nything. Installation guy came in just 2 hours of delivery. This has been an awesome buy for me. You don't have to think twice to purchase this.

Very good product from Panasonic at an unbelievable price. Has sufficient storage space. Easy to shift from one place to other since it has wheels. Delivered by Flipkart in good condition but only hassle was to arrange for men to hoist the refrigerator to 3rd floor of my apartment. Installation was done on next day of delivery of the product. Extremely satisfied with the service of Flipkart.

good refrigerator with ample freezer space. shelf depth and height is adequate for placing large bowels. lower vegetable basket is quiet small.no noise even if you stand very close to it. Good cooling even at temperature of 47 degree in my city. you can store good quantities of icecream bricks, and other essentials like dry fruits etc in this fridge. It releases heat by only side walls .Back of the fridge remains cool. so you have no need to leave any space between back wall and refrigerator. you can put about 8 bottles of water and 3 large cold drink bottles at a time. The vegetables remain fresh as long as 5-6 days. but fruits can be placed for only 3 days maximum.

just 1 week of operational fridge, good value for money fridge of this capacity, and good after sale installation and service staff.
however there are some of the things that I see not working for me.
1 the fruit and vegetable baskets are very small for the fridge of this size, they are not deep and storage capacity is small in the baskets.
2 in the freezer section the I was told that door panel is like chiller, but anything store there is also getting frozen, any cheese sauces milk etc everything freezes.

Smart built refrigerator
All in all a brilliant refrigerator with smart technology and good quality. Thanks flipkart awesome product| True internal space provided by Panasonic 278l net and immaculate technology for everyday use with power saving mode |

Perfect choice for me, first I was hesitating to buy Panasonic brand but now I must say it's amazing experience to own Panasonic side by side refrigerator previous I owened Electrolux single door refrigerator so decided to own any premium this time delivery by Flipkart in just 4 days in solid condition not any single scratches on it delivered by blue dart now come to space it has huge space perfect for 8 ppl family although we r only 4 ppl choiced this now I come to power consumption .we r all Indian first see how much power any appliances consumption before buying I did checked on various websites but no where's mentioned abt it still took risk and bought even Panasonic website shows nothing abt power efecency it's consuming abt 170 watt in first start up that means it will consume between 1 to 1.5 unit per day depends on how many time u open and close it yearly consumption could be between 350 to 500 unit it's very very very reasonable consumption go for it don't hesitate to buy it just own it thank you Flipkart for sweet deal during anniversary sale

The product is really good! It's definitely worth its cost! 👍
We wanted a bigger fridge since a long time and finally got one!
My family is very happy about this purchase from Flipkart! My wife is happy as ever!
it's too good and big, nice for 4 to 5 members and got it from flipkart very cheaper compare to all store and online, feels very happy thanks flipkart and Panasonic

it's a very nice product, totally worth for money
best budget side by side fridge,just go for it without any hesitation. nice thing is the cooling speed and electric consumption i.e, rapid cooling and less consumption

One of the best buys that I have done online. I was sceptical about 1. The performance of the product and 2. The delivery without damage.
Flipkart delivered it in pristine condition on the scheduled day (my preference of Saturday) and in about 3 hours had a visit by the Panasonic engineer for installation.

Ever since this fridge got installed in our house we have been getting a steady stream of admirers to have a look at and awe-struck. It indeed is a value for money deal. A slightly bigger refrigerator chamber would have been great, though its depth compensates a bit !! full-marks to Omnitech for the prompt mapping of the product so that i could track its status very accurately. In fact product got delivered one day earlier than promised !

i have been using for 9 months now. The performance is good . This gets heated when you switch on for the first time ,for a few days and then cools down after use. the service in Chennai has been good and a minor problem in light switch ( got stuck) sorted out in a few hours . Initially the cooling was very good like a freezer in the refrigerator compartment, for a couple of months and that has come down . . May be that is how it is designed .

It is a awesome fridge. With superb cooling system and big storing capacity. Recommend to all who needs big storage and performance with budget price. Also support services of Panasonic is remarkable.
good product good delivery demo is not good price is satisfied
good space . value of money
This is and outstanding fridge. It was right decision to buy this product from Flipkart. The price was right. The demonstration was done so quickly on same day.
excellent design value of money and performance is good, but both sides are little bit heat

Excellent product in this price range. It reached to me within 2 days of placing the order. It is working quietly since I bought it about fortnight back. I faced some problem with respect to occurrence of droplets in normal fridge section and asked Flipkart for exchange, which they did as Panasonic technician never visited to check if problem is minor or major. Full points to Flipkart here! So when technician again visited for the installation of the replaced fridge, he clarified that droplets is common occurrence and it is nothing to worry. I have also bought stabilizer to avoid any voltage fluctuation related damages. Although Panasonic claims that it is inbuilt but I did not want to take chances and so bought stabilizer also.

I bought this product two years back, to be precise May 2019. The delivery and installation were fine, But after using it for two years, I had faced an issue. The refrigerator is not working, during a further investigation from the service team came to know the board was damaged. Since I had taken a 2 years extended warranty, I was eligible to get the damaged parts replaced. Then I started to follow up, recently came to know the parts are not available, thus they agreed to return back the refrigerator with cash in return while considering depreciation. I have lost the depreciation amount and extended warranty cost for a refrigerator which I have used only for two years. Now am waiting for them to pick up my damaged refrigerator.........

answers: A:Digital Inverter Compressor intelligently varies its power and running speed according to immediate cooling requirement of the compressor.
A:40-80L: Ideal for Bachelors or as bedroom fridge, 80-240L: Ideal for Couples and Small families, 240-400L: Ideal for Family of 4 to 5, 400L and Above: Good for Large Families
A:Yes. If you're looking to fit large vessels on the shelves, you can do so by adjusting the height of the toughened glass shelves.

A:It does not require a stabilizer since it comes with an voltage fluctuation safe internal circuitary. However, if you face frequent voltage fluctuations, an external stabilizer is recommended.
